education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
education.degree: BTech In Computer Science With Specialization In Big Data Analytics
Senior School Certificate Examination in Biology and Mathematics

details: Defined clear problem statements for a wildlife species detection project.
Collected a comprehensive dataset from diverse sources, including field surveys, camera traps, and public databases, aggregating over 1000 data points.
Trained machine learning models using the annotated dataset, achieving a 15% improvement in species detection accuracy over baseline models.
Generated insights through model performance metrics such as precision, recall, and F1 score, facilitating data-driven decision-making for wildlife conservation efforts.
Conducted Data Cleaning and Manipulation tasks, processing approximately 5000 records to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Implemented data visualization techniques in Python, creating interactive visualization to analyze trends and patterns in a real-world dataset containing over 10,000 data points.
Presented an in-depth analysis of SQL and its applications in data management and analysis.

Completed two significant projects: Sales Analysis project, analyzing sales data to uncover trends and generate insightful reports using advanced SQL queries; Animated Movie Analysis project, examining data on animated movies to identify patterns in box office performance, utilizing SQL for comprehensive data aggregation and analysis.

personal_projects.name: Election-India-2024-Insights
details: Web scraping | SQL | Data Analysis | Reporting.
Analyzed data from the Election Commission of India website to uncover key insights into voter behavior, party performance, and regional trends.

Used the Listly Browser Extension to extract and structure data, then used SQL to generate a detailed report highlighting metrics such as party representation, winning margins, candidate success rates, and regional strengths.

personal_projects.name: Bank Loan Report
details: Data Analysis | Programming (Python) | Data Visualization (Tableau) | Domain Knowledge
Developed a comprehensive Bank Loan Report in Tableau, analyzing 38,000 rows of data and visualizing key insights on loan applications, funded amounts, and repayment behavior.
Used SQL to extract data and Tableau dashboards to showcase metrics like Total Loan Applications, Funded Amounts, and Amounts Received across various dimensions.

achievements.title: Second prize in Recursion Hackathon
achievements.details: Developed a full stack Budget Tracker.

details: Foundations of Data Science and Python; Translating Data into Insights and The Power of Statistics: Developed a robust understanding of data science fundamentals and Python for data manipulation and analysis. Using statistical techniques, learned to transform raw data into actionable insights and uncover patterns.

Regression Analysis and Machine Learning; Google Advanced Data Analytics Capstone and Practical Assessments: Explored regression analysis for predicting outcomes and learned to build machine learning models. The capstone project provided hands-on experience, preparing for advanced roles in data analytics and entry-level roles in data science.
Developed expertise in using Tableau, Microsoft Power BI, and Microsoft Excel for data visualization and analytics.
Enhanced ability to create impactful visualizations and perform complex data analysis efficiently.
Gained in-depth knowledge of data analytics and data visualization techniques, supporting data-driven decision-making in various professional contexts.
Hands-on experience through live projects and mentorship, significantly enhancing proficiency in Python programming, data analysis, and machine learning.
Participation in industrial training led to a certification with guaranteed internship opportunities, equipping to effectively tackle real-world data science challenges.
